## Bonus `repomix` tricks

### Filter with --include\` and glob patterns

``` bash
repomix --include "*.sh,README.md"
```

### Pack a Github repository with `--remote`

``` bash
repomix --remote https://github.com/Promptly-Technologies-LLC/etielle

llm -f repomix-output.xml "Can I use this library to map JSON to my DB?"
```
